metadata.description: Imagin3 is a Web3 studio of builders, investors, and believers in this exciting new wave of the Internet. We have been advising on every wave of the internet since the early â€˜90s, serving 150+ organizations over the last 10 years as Scopernia. At Imagin3 we believe in a future digital on-chain identity.  With our Imagin3 PFPs, every stakeholder related to Imagin3 will be able to proof its professional identity, merits linked to Imagin3 and start engaging in the tokenized Imagin3 ecosystem.  For the art Imagin3 collaborated with local artist Leen AL Msouti , which fits into Imagine3's mission of fostering local talent and the MENA Web3 ecosystem.
